Package ohos.agp.components.webengine

Interface ScaleController


  • public interface ScaleController
    Manages and observes scaling of a WebView object.
    Since:
    6

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getTextScale​()
      Obtains the text scaling of a WebView object.
      boolean isGestureScalable​()
      Checks whether a WebView object is scalable using gesture.
      boolean isScalable​()
      Checks whether a WebView object is scalable.
      void setGestureScalable​(boolean isScalable)
      Specifies whether a WebView object is scalable using gesture.
      void setScalable​(boolean isScalable)
      Specifies whether a WebView object is scalable.
      void setScale​(int percent)
      Sets the scaling of a WebView object.
      void setScaleChangeListener​(ScaleChangeListener listener)
      Adds a listener that listens for scale changes of a WebView object.
      void setTextScale​(int percent)
      Sets the text scaling of a WebView object.

    • Method Detail

      • setScale

        void setScale​(int percent)
        Sets the scaling of a WebView object. The default scaling is determined by this method as well as WebConfig#setViewPortFitScreen and WebConfig#setAutoFitOnLoad.
        Parameters:
        percent - Indicates the scaling percentage. Value 0 indicates the default scaling.
        Since:
        6

      • setScalable

        void setScalable​(boolean isScalable)
        Specifies whether a WebView object is scalable.
        Parameters:
        isScalable - Specifies whether the WebView object is scalable. Value true indicates that the WebView object is scalable, and value false indicates the opposite. The default value is true.
        Since:
        6

      • isScalable

        boolean isScalable​()
        Checks whether a WebView object is scalable.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the WebView object is scalable; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        6

      • setGestureScalable

        void setGestureScalable​(boolean isScalable)
        Specifies whether a WebView object is scalable using gesture.
        Parameters:
        isScalable - Specifies whether the WebView object is scalable using gesture. Value true indicates that the WebView object is scalable using gesture, and false indicates the opposite. The default value is false.
        Since:
        6

      • isGestureScalable

        boolean isGestureScalable​()
        Checks whether a WebView object is scalable using gesture.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the WebView object is scalable using gesture; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        6

      • setTextScale

        void setTextScale​(int percent)
        Sets the text scaling of a WebView object.
        Parameters:
        percent - Indicates the scaling percentage.
        Since:
        6

      • getTextScale

        int getTextScale​()
        Obtains the text scaling of a WebView object.
        Returns:
        Returns the scaling percentage.
        Since:
        6

      • setScaleChangeListener

        void setScaleChangeListener​(ScaleChangeListener listener)
        Adds a listener that listens for scale changes of a WebView object.
        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the ScaleChangeListener instance.
        Since:
        6
